text:
I couldn't recommend this place enough. Alex is a very thoughtful host and it was really easy to get in touch with him before and during the stay. The apartment was clean and well-stocked with extra towels, blankets, etc. The location is also great: just a few blocks from grocery stores, restaurants, and the subway stop.



I would definitely stay here again if I were to make another trip to New York City.
title: Best location in NYC, Times Square
